query.statement:
-- SELECT T11.PRONR, T12.VER, T11.PROWRK, T12.PSPID, T11.PRO_R, T11.ZCHECK
SELECT T11.PRONR, MAX(T12.VER) VER, MAX(T11.PROWRK) PROWRK, MAX(T12.PSPID) PSPID, MAX(T11.PRO_R) PRO_R, MAX(T11.ZCHECK) ZCHECK,MAX(T11.PRO_SUM) PRO_SUM , MAX(T11.GISUNG_CHK) AS GISUNG_CHK
#S2_QUERY+#
FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0111 T11
left OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0112 T12 ON T11.MANDT = T12.MANDT AND T11.GUBUN = T12.GUBUN AND T11.PRONR = T12.PRONR AND T11.VER = T12.VER AND T12.PSPID = #POSID# left OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 R02 ON T12.MANDT = R02.MANDT AND T12.PSPID = R02.POSID AND T12.POSID = R02.POSID_1 -- AND R02.ZZCHAKG = 'X' AND R02.TXT04 NOT IN ('C','B','R7') LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0112C AS F ON R02.MANDT = F.MANDT AND R02.POSID = F.PSPID AND R02.POSID_1 = F.POSID AND (R02.ZZCHAKG = 'X' OR F.POSID IS NOT NULL) left OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW0304 T13 ON T11.MANDT = T13.MANDT AND T11.GUBUN = T13.GUBUN AND T11.PRONR = T13.PRONR AND T13.PSPID = #POSID# left OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 R03 ON T13.MANDT = R03.MANDT AND T13.PSPID = R03.POSID AND T13.POSID = R03.POSID_1
WHERE T11.GUBUN = #GUBUN# AND T11.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND T11.TYPE = #TYPE# -- AND T11.VER = (SELECT VALUE(max(VER),'000') -- FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0112 -- WHERE PSPID = #POSID# -- AND MANDT = #G_MANDT# -- AND GUBUN = #GUBUN#)
GROUP BY T11.PRONR,T11.MANDT -- GROUP BY T12.VER, T11.PRONR, T11.PROWRK, T12.PSPID, T11.PRO_R, T11.ZCHECK ORDER BY T11.PRONR
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
